content:
skyscraper
whose pen hides a redwood.
This paper is a heating system
whose writing hides a cliff face
 
This screen is a forget-me-not,
whose mobile hides a fireplace,
This pulse is a murderer,
whose skin hides a traffic sign.
 
Hidden skyscraper is a butter mountain,
whose redwood is a funeral parlour,
heating system is an arctic hare,
whose cliff face is a woman’s eyebrow.
 
This Forget-me-not is a whip-poor-will,
whose fireplace hides a metallic road,
This murderer is a modern dance,
whose traffic sign hides a drowning man.
